title: Application complete
successParagraph1: You have completed your application to stop a grant of probate (caveat).
successParagraph2: We’ll send you an email within 5 working days to confirm what’s happened.
successParagraph3: You may want to talk to a solicitor or contact Citizen Advice (opens in a new window) to get advice.
